member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Common.WeakEventListener`3
member.summary: Implements a weak event listener that allows the owner to be garbage collected if its only remaining link is an event handler.
member.typeparam: Type of instance listening for the event.
Type of source for the event.
Type of event arguments for the event.

remarks.para:
More info here: http://dlaa.me/blog/post/9468464
The following example demonstrates how to use the weak event listener so that the RadGaugeBase class can track AnimationSettings changes. In the example the RadGaugeBase is 'this' and 'listener'. The AnimationSettings is the 'eventSource' and 'sender'.
